official_title: Innovations to Prevent Relapse Among Low-income African American Smokers
inclusion_criteria:
* Adult smokers recruited from the community by study community navigator and flyers
* Self-identify as African American
* Report no tobacco smoking within the past 3-90 days and have a carbon monoxide (CO) reading of â‰¤ 3 ppm
* Have access to SMS texting
* Meet federal definitions of low-income
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: - Study team will offer to enroll ineligible smokers in the publicly available smokefreeTXT (if applicable) or refer them to the Ohio state quitline
